product_name: Keen Marshall Mid WP Hiking Boots - Men's
long_description: With waterproof, breathable uppers that keep feet dry plus cushioned midsoles for underfoot comfort, the Keen Marshall Mid WP Hiking Boots provide a supportive platform for all your hiking adventures. Waterproof nylon mesh uppers with synthetic leather overlays provide lightweight support while promoting breathability. KEEN.DRY(TM) waterproof breathable membranes keep feet dry while allowing perspiration to dissipate. Polyester mesh linings are highly breathable and wick moisture away from the feet for comfort. EVA footbeds provide ample cushioning, and are removable to accommodate orthotics; polyurethane midsoles supply shock absorption for all-day comfort. Supportive thermoplastic urethane shanks enhance torsional stability on uneven terrain. Keen Marshall Mid WP hiking boots have nonmarking rubber outsoles with 4mm multidirectional lugs that offer excellent all-around traction.
short_description: With waterproof, breathable uppers that keep feet dry plus cushioned midsoles for underfoot comfort, the Keen Marshall Mid WP Hiking Boots provide a supportive platform for all your hiking adventures.
